titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Fire Prevention Week, which begins on October 3, 2010, and the work of firefighters in educating and protecting the communities of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 9/23/2010--Introduced. Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of Fire Prevention Week, which begins on October 3, 2010; and (2) the work of firefighters in educating and protecting U.S. communities.
